Identification.LongTitle: Order Designating Certain Countries and Military Service Agencies for the Purposes of Tariff Item No. 9810.00.00

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to paragraph 132(1)(g) of the Customs Tariffa, hereby makes the annexed Order Designating Certain Countries and Military Service Agencies for the Purposes of Tariff Item No. 9810.00.00.

Section.Text: The following countries are designated for the purposes of tariff item No. 9810.00.00 of the Customs Tariff:
The following military service agencies are designated for the purposes of tariff item No. 9810.00.00 of the Customs Tariff:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: German Air Force Tactical Training Command, Goose Bay, Labrador, Newfoundland

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: Post Exchanges - AC & W Sites authorized by the Minister of National Revenue

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: Royal Air Force Detachment, Goose Bay, Labrador, Newfoundland

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: United States Military Services Agencies at Goose Bay Airport, Labrador, Newfoundland

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: United States Property Accountability Office, Headquarters ADC Detachment No. 1, Ottawa, Ontario

Section.Text: This Order comes into force on January 1, 1998.
